name: coveradge
description: Generate coverage badges during local nyc/istanbul execution

scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm i && echo "Reenable npm run license-badges" when may support pnpm
scripts.license-badge:
license-badger --corrections --uncategorizedLicenseTemplate "\${license} (\${name} (\${version}))" --filteredTypes=nonempty --textTemplate "License types
(project, deps, and bundled devDeps)" --packageJson --production badges/licenses-badge.svg
scripts.license-badges: npm run license-badge && npm run license-badge-dev
scripts.test-unit: rimraf node_modules/.cache && c8 --reporter "$(pwd)/src/reporter.cjs" --reporter json-summary npm run mocha
scripts.test-nocov: npm run eslint && npm run test-unit
scripts.c8: c8 npm run test-unit && npm run cli -- --output ./badges/coverage-badge.svg
scripts.test: npm run eslint && npm run c8

author: Brett Zamir
